page.title: 04VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Excerpts from Parish News Aug.1985: Thanks to all, knitters and sponsors, who supported the{Knit-in,}which raised Â£191.50; the squares have been made up into a knee-rug which has been sent to Parwich Care centre... Thanks for{donations}of Â£370.30 in memory of Annie Gerard .. Our sympathy to Kathleen Hodgkinson and family and Ken Ollerenshaw and family on the death of their mother ... Please remember in your{prayers}Stephen Watson, who is in Chesterfield Hospital with a fractured leg after being knocked down by a car; also Joyce Coates convalescing after an operation ...Best wishes to Jean Harvey who left Brassington School at the end of term...Tickets for the Annual Prize Draw to be made at the {Coffee Evening}on 20th September will be on sale later this month.
